name: Hook Line
description:
'A' or Left Arrow to move left

'D' or Right Arrow to move right

'W' or Up arrow to draw yourself up with the grappling hook

'Space' to jump

'Left-Click' to shoot your grappling hook

'Right Click' will return it to you

The spinning diamond objects are coins, so collect them.

The turtle things are enemies, don't get hit by them or you will die. Shoot them with your grappling hook.

Get to the Portal to move to the next level.

How high can you get your score?

If you have any suggestions for updates, please leave them in the comments :)
